original_text: And ye shall compass the king round about, every man with his weapons in his hand: and he that cometh within the ranges, let him be slain: and be ye with the king as he goeth out and as he cometh in.
korean_text: 너희는 각각 손에 무기를 잡고 왕을 호위하며 너희 대열을 침범하는 모든 자는 죽이고 왕이 출입할 때에 시위할지니라 하니

sentences.original_text: And ye shall compass the king round about
every man with his weapons in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 각 사람은 자기 손에 무기를 들고

sentences.original_text: and he that cometh within the ranges
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 범위 안으로 들어오는 자는

sentences.original_text: and be ye with the king
